name: wygiwyh
description: WYGIWYH (What You Get Is What You Have) is a self-hosted tool for tracking and introspecting personal data or metrics, presenting them in dashboards and timelines via a clean, browser-based UI.
features: Data tracking: Log personal metrics, habits, or events with customizable data fields and types.
Timeline view: Visualize tracked data chronologically to see patterns and trends over time.
Dashboard widgets: Create custom dashboards with charts, counters, and summaries of your data.
Custom categories: Define your own data categories to track anything from mood to expenses.
Data visualization: Generate graphs and charts to understand your tracked metrics at a glance.
Search and filter: Query historical data with filters to find specific entries or time periods.
Export functionality: Download your data in JSON or CSV format for backup or external analysis.
Privacy first: Keep all personal data on your own server without third-party access or cloud sync.
Mobile responsive: Access and update your tracking data from any device via responsive web design.
Recurring entries: Set up templates for regularly tracked items to speed up daily logging.
Notes and context: Add text notes to entries for additional context or observations.
Data aggregation: View summaries and statistics across different time ranges like daily, weekly, or monthly.
